short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cipherwill's browser extension functions as a Dead Man's Switch, reminding you to update your cipherwill.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Secure your digital legacy effortlessly with the Cipherwill Chrome extension. This intuitive tool integrates seamlessly into your browsing experience, reminding you to keep your digital will up-to-date. Safeguard your digital assets and ensure your loved ones receive what matters most. With end-to-end encryption, your data remains private and accessible only to designated beneficiaries. Take control of your legacy today with Cipherwill.

What is Cipherwill?
Cipherwill is a pioneering platform designed to safeguard and manage your digital legacy effectively. It allows users to securely store and organize crucial information such as financial assets, online accounts, and personal wishes in one encrypted repository. With advanced security measures like end-to-end encryption, Cipherwill ensures that your data remains confidential and accessible only to designated beneficiaries. In the event of your passing, Cipherwill facilitates the seamless transfer of your digital assets according to your wishes, providing peace of mind that your legacy is protected and honored.
